headline: AI Chips Update - VAST Data Shines on Forbes AI 50 List 2025
summary: VAST Data has been recognized on the Forbes AI 50 list for 2025, which highlights the most promising private AI companies globally. This listing underscores VAST’s significant role in AI infrastructure, evidenced by its platform being utilized by numerous organizations for AI training and inference operations. The company has been noted for its strong innovation and sustained growth in the competitive AI market. VAST Data’s distributed, internet-scale platform has become integral to...
